data.title: Manning Media Inc.
data.meta_description:
Manning Media Inc. | 357 followers on LinkedIn. We create the best possible Marketing Solutions in a professional and personal way. | Manning Media, Inc.is an integrated media company serving Central Maryland, South Central Pennsylvania, The Eastern Panhandle of West Virginia and Northern Virginia for nearly thirty years. 

With a history of providing the region’s top radio stations and a mission to lead the industry in marketing technology, we provide a fully integrated digital media solution designed to provide the maximum results for our clients.

Manning Media incorporates on-air broadcasting, on-line digital display advertising, on-site events and interactive marketing to create the best possible delivery of your message.
data.text: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Finally…there is HOPE! Manning Media launches HOPE FM in Frederick and Hagerstown. Frederick, MD, November 14, 2023 – Manning Media, Inc., Mid-Maryland’s local broadcasting leader, is excited to announce the launch of its latest radio station, HOPE FM, a Christian contemporary radio station at 94.3FM in Frederick and 102.1FM in Hagerstown. This new station aims to bring a message of hope, faith, and inspiration to the local community. HOPE FM is dedicated to uplifting its listeners with the best Christian contemporary music and community-focused programming. The station’s mission is to be a source of encouragement and positivity, offering a unique blend of content that resonates with the hometown values and spirit of the Frederick and Hagerstown areas. A New Voice in Christian Broadcasting HOPE FM is more than just a radio station; it's a community partner committed to spreading positivity and hope. With a strong emphasis on faith and community values, HOPE FM aims to be the go-to source for uplifting content and spiritual encouragement. Community Engagement and Involvement Manning Media, Inc. believes in the power of community and is committed to making HOPE FM a platform for positive change and connection. The station will actively engage with local events, charities, and initiatives, providing a voice to those striving to make a difference in the community. Additionally, the station plans to partner with local ministries to provide a local outlet for their message. Tune In and Be Inspired We invite everyone in Frederick and Hagerstown to tune in to 94.3FM and 102.1FM and experience the difference with HOPE FM. Join us in this journey of faith, hope, and inspiration. Stay connected with HOPE FM through our website(Hopefmmd.com) and Facebook page for the latest news, programming updates, and community events. For Media Inquiries: Fred Manning President/CEO HOPE FM - Manning Media, Inc. 301-620-7700, x3011 fmanning@manningmediainc.com
